articles.author: Alana Wise
articles.title: Poland's Iga Świątek thrashes American Amanda Anisimova in Wimbledon women’s final - NPR
articles.description: The Polish player emerged victorious after less than an hour of gameplay.
articles.content:
The Wimbledon women's final came to an abrupt close on Saturday as Poland's Iga witek delivered a swift, crushing defeat against American player Amanda Anisimova.

articles.title: Here’s how much money New Yorkers need to retire comfortably: new study - New York Post
articles.description: Most Americans have less than $89,000 saved for retirement.
articles.content:
Retired New Yorkers need an average of $50,997 per year to cover their living expenses after factoring in Social Security payments, new research has found.
